a.data-title: World Read Aloud Day at RMS

img.alt: World Read Aloud Day at RMS

div.a: World Read Aloud Day at RMS

div.p: Rindge Memorial School participated in World Read Aloud Day on Wednesday, February 5, 2020.
A number of guests came into classrooms throughout the day to share wonderful stories. Thank you to everyone who stopped by to read a book to a class!

img.alt: JGS Online Scholastic Book Fair - April 27 to May 8

div.a: JGS Online Scholastic Book Fair - April 27 to May 8

div.p: The JGS Library and the JGS Parents Group have teamed up to host a Scholastic Online Book Fair. All district families are are welcome to participate!
